mapper.select: select student_id AS id, student_name AS name, student_grade AS year, subject_name AS major, college_name AS college from student s join subject sub on s.subject_id = sub.subject_id join college c on sub.college_id = c.college_id where student_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from course_selected where student_id = #{student_id} and course_id = #{course_id}
